level.text: The following information shall be provided for a rate of return summary:
Capital structure (consolidated, partially consolidated or other) and weighted cost thereof as of the most recent data available; and

Capital structure (consolidated, partially consolidated or other) and weighted cost thereof as of the end of the historical test year and the proposed test year. If the data filed in subparagraph (a) is different, an explanation of the differences and adjustments applied shall be provided.
For each class or type of capital the data shall show the following:
The summary shall reference the supporting schedule for each item showing detailed composition and calculations.
